original: Anidassanasappaṭighaṁ bāhiraṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasanidassanasappaṭigho nabāhiro dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā ekādasa, ārammaṇe tīṇi …pe… avigate ekādasa.

translated: With an external object that is not visible and has impingement as condition, an internal object that is not visible and has impingement arises, by root-cause condition … (In brief:) with root-cause, eleven; with object, three; … with non-adversion, eleven.
